title: Karma Bundle
body:
Is there going to be a Karma bundle to go along with her updated splash arts?

From what I understand there was a bundle for Nidalee, Twitch, Trundle and Fiora when their updated splash arts went live, so there should be one for Karma as well but I don't see it in the shop. Please put up her bundle and have Traditional Karma included in it.

replies.body: Alas, I'm not aware of any bundles or sales until they've been announced on the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page or posted on the store.  Bookmark the page and keep your eyes peeled should such a bundle come out.  Focus your resolve!
I had a question regarding the splash update bundles, any chance there are 1920x1080 versions of the other Sion, Twitch, Fiora, Nidalee, Trundle and Tristana splashes lying around?

The best ones I can find are on the Sales pages or patch notes.  For example, I grabbed this one of [Fiora ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/fiora_royalguard_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=146_KtSu)from her [bundle sale](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/en-garde-fiora-splash-update) page.  I'd suggest starting there, but the community may also have some handy on the [Story and Art ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art)boards.  I hope that helps!
Good news, Karma bundle is up!

Also interested in the Karma skins: will traditional and sun goddess karma return to the store at all? I believe all the other legacy skins were rereleased for a period of time with the splashart update (e.g. Poppy, Twitch), and I understood this would happen with Karma as well. Will these skins return to the store?
